description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pork with Mango & Cucumber Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast pork,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Microwave,Wheat free,Pork,Mango,Peanut free
name: Roast Pork with Mango & Cucumber Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Piece each potato with a fork 6 times. Place potatoes around the outer edge of microwave turntable and cook on high for 5 minutes. Turn over and cook for a further 5 minutes on high (potatoes will still be firm).
Preheat oven to 220°C. Line a large baking tray with non-stick baking paper.

Combine hoisin, brown sugar and garlic in a large bowl. Add pork rashers and turn to coat. Arrange pork rashers in a single layer on a rack over the tray. Place on the top shelf and cook for 20 minutes.
Place potatoes on a shelf below the pork and cook both for 10 minutes until the pork is caramelised and the potatoes are crisp.
Meanwhile, cut mango and cucumber into cubes and place into a bowl. Add lime juice, olive oil, sugar and mint. Toss gently to combine. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
Cut a cross in top of each potato and fill with sour cream.
Place pork onto plates, top with salsa and serve with potato.
